nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            before_build:
          
          
            
            - dotnet restore
          
      
    
    
  

If you use the dotnet build command, dotnet restore is automatic and is not needed.

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            build:
          
          
            
              project: {{{packageName}}}.sln
          
          
            
              verbosity: minimal
          
          
            
            build_script:
          
          
            
            - dotnet build -c Release
          
      
    
    
  

Since the appveyor build command behaves differently on Windows and Linux, it is better to use the dotnet build command.

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            test_script:
          
          
            
            - dotnet test -c Release .\src\{{{packageName}}}.Test\{{{packageName}}}.Test.csproj
          
          
            
            - dotnet test -c Release
          
      
    
    
  

dotnet test automatically searches for test projects included in the solution, so there is no need to explicitly specify projects.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+# auto-generated by OpenAPI Generator (https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator)
+#
+image: Visual Studio 2019
+clone_depth: 1
+before_build:
+- dotnet restore
+build:
+  project: {{{packageName}}}.sln
+  verbosity: minimal
+test_script:
+- dotnet test -c Release .\src\{{{packageName}}}.Test\{{{packageName}}}.Test.csproj
+after_build:
+- dotnet pack .\src\{{{packageName}}}\{{{packageName}}}.csproj -o ../../output --no-build
